description:
X3pure is the first online, confidential, streaming-video solution for men dealing with sexual addiction. This workshop provides you with the absolute fundamentals for understanding compulsive sexual behaviors like masturbation, pornography use, extra-marital/pre-marital sex, or visiting strip clubs or prostitutes. Easy to understand and accessible, you can log on to this 30-day program from any internet-connected computer or mobile product (with internet browser) at any time.

There are 15 workshops lasting between 15-25 minutes.  A downloadable companion workbook with 15 lesson exercises comes with the course. 

The primary objective of X3pure is to enable a speedy and effective recovery for people dealing with internet pornography and other sex-related addictions in the most confidential and professional manner possible.  **This is a single-user workshop.**  If you are looking for a small group curriculum for multiple users please check out the small group kits here.

While sexual addiction is not a religious-only or Christian-only problem, these workshops have been authored by a Christian but can be viewed by people of all religions or of no religious belief.

Additionally, the program was created by a team of people who understand what you are going through--and specifically the unbelievable barriers to getting help. We understand the need for confidentiality and the need for a program that can help without you having to tell four different people that you need help.
title: X3pure - 30 days to purity.
